com.spears.environments

Class EnvironmentModifier<T extends EnvironmentMap>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spears.environments.EnvironmentModifier<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Map type that extends EnvironmentMap
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmptyPoolGen, Gradient, PlasmaFractalGen, ScalingModifier, Smoothing3D, SmoothingModifier, TruncateModifier

    public abstract class EnvironmentModifier<T extends EnvironmentMap>
extends java.lang.Object
    An extendable utility object for modifying/generating environment maps. Should be labeled as a modifier for use. A generator should produce a unique map, a modifier should manipulate the provided map.

      • modify

        public final T modify(T map,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> params)
        Public facing modify method. Performs modification on the provided map and returns a new map instance. Cannot be extended by developers see doModify(EnvironmentMap, Map).
        Parameters:
        map - A EnvironmentMap of the appropriate type
        params - Parameter map to be used by the modification
        Returns:
        A new EnvironmentMap instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the provided map is of the wrong type

      • doModify

        protected abstract T doModify(T map,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> params)
        Developer method: this method should be extended to implement new modification functions.
        Parameters:
        map - (final) Incoming map, gaunted to be of correct type
        params - Parameter map
        Returns:
        Should return a new instance
